long_description: Designed for active, outdoor use, the waterproof Yurbuds Explore Pro Earphones offer 3-button music/call control and a secure behind-the-ear design so they'll stay in place while you're on the go. Soft and flexible ear hangers help keep the earbuds in place through all kinds of intense physical movement. Ergonomic design employs medical-grade silicone to offer a soft, comfortable and personalized fit that avoids pressing on sensitive pain points. Clinically proven acoustics deliver deep, rich sound with all types of music, yet earbuds allow sufficient ambient noise to keep you aware of your surroundings. Single-button microphone system seamlessly controls music tracks and voice calls on most smartphones. The Yurbuds Explore Pro Earphones feature flat Kevlar cords with a protective coating for waterproof and tangle-resistant durability.
short_description: Designed for active, outdoor use, the waterproof Yurbuds Explore Pro Earphones offer 3-button music/call control and a secure behind-the-ear design so they'll stay in place while you're on the go.
